experiencefragment.text: Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â NEWSÂ Â Â Â THE GROUPEÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â SERVICESÂ Â Â Â INVESTORSÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â FRÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â OverviewÂ Â Â Â Job OpportunitiesÂ Â Â Development in the Groupe Publicis Groupeâ€™s philosophy revolves around the equation : ( IQ + EQ + TQ ) Intellectual Quotient, Technology Quotient and Emotional Quotient to power creativity and disruption. The talent we recruit has to score high on these elements: Intellectual Quotient: any approach to brand communication or product marketing requires serious thought and astute strategic counsel. Coupled with the need to transform a business model or marketing strategy, itâ€™s led to the development of consulting as an activity in its own right. A strong IQ is therefore crucial to face the challenges of the Digital Age. Technology Quotient: we know how to make the most of the unprecedented capabilities of new technologies. Emotional Quotient: itâ€™s the heart of our business and what makes us stand out. EQ, powered by creativity, ensures the success of the greatest alchemies, valorizing and transcending Publicis Groupeâ€™s offer to bring a vital touch of humanity to our brand content.
